description:
Create a dedicated tool for building meeting agendas with time-boxed topics, assigned presenters, linked entities, and document attachments. Generate agenda PDFs and track actual vs planned timing during meetings.

**Rationale:** Policy meetings require careful planning and time management. A structured agenda tool ensures productive meetings and creates a clear record linked to relevant entities and commitments.
title: Meeting Agenda Builder with Time Allocation
